import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Songs } from "../Context"; import "./style.css"; import Playing from "./Playing"; import { Col, Row } from "antd"; export default function DetailSong() { const { song } = useContext(Songs); return ( //

play_arrow
skip_next queue_music
queue_music Music list

    ); }
